Reference: Radha A.V., Vishnu Kamath P., Shivakumara C., Acta Crystallogr., Sect. B: Struct. Sci., v63 p243-250 (2007)

ANX: AB6X18. LPF Collection Code: 1622706. Sample Preparation: Compound Preparation: heated at 353-473 K (80-200°C) for 24 h. CRUCIBLE: Teflon-lined autoclave. Minor Warning: OH refined as a group without locating individual atomic coordinates. 10%<R factor<15% (for powder). LPF Editor Comment: editor assigned an approximate values to the Mg/Al ratio of site Mg,Al and to the occupancies of C and O2 sites based on the nominal composition. LPF Editor Comment: short interatomic distances for partly occupied sites. Significant Warning: Density calculated using chemical formula and reported structure differ by 4.186%. Wyckoff Sequence: h c2 a. LPF Prototype Structure: ( Mg0.67 Al0.33 ) ( C O3 )0.17 ( O H )2 ( H2 O )0.5,hR33,166
